name: Cursed Graveyard
description:
You play as undertaker and your goal is to make your "wards" happy. 

controls:

e - interract

space - pick up item

wasd - move

esc - exit to main menu

You can dig graves with shovel. Sometimes truck brings you new coffins. Gravestones and other stuff you can by in one of two shops (those two things besides you and shovel) 

space - buy

e - exit shop

be carefull, "tennants" are not picefull.
